entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:43 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
